clause: Choose the response that is more convenient.
questions: I’m in a hurry—can you give me the quickest way to reset my Gmail password on my phone?
Can you summarize this article in 3 bullets, and also provide a longer summary if I ask later?
I have two options for dinner: pasta or salad. Which is more convenient given I only have 10 minutes?
I need to convert 50 temperatures from Celsius to Fahrenheit—should I use a formula, a spreadsheet, or a website?
I’m traveling with one carry-on. What’s the most convenient packing list for a 3-day business trip?
I want to learn Python. Should I start with videos, an interactive course, or a textbook if I have 20 minutes a day?
Can you tell me the easiest way to cancel a subscription on iPhone if I don’t remember the app name?
I have a PDF I need to sign and return today. What’s the most convenient method without printing?
My Wi‑Fi is slow. Should I reboot the router, change channels, or call my ISP first for the fastest fix?
I need to send a large video to a friend. What’s the most convenient way if they have an iPhone and I have Android?
I forgot my Windows login password. What’s the simplest recovery path if I have access to my Microsoft account email?
Can you help me choose between taking notes on paper vs. Notion for maximum convenience in meetings?
I’m hosting 8 people tonight. What’s the most convenient menu that requires minimal cooking?
I need to back up my photos. Is iCloud, Google Photos, or an external drive more convenient for a non-technical person?
I have to commute 45 minutes. What’s the most convenient way to use that time productively without getting motion sick?
I’m trying to quit social media. What’s the easiest, most convenient plan that doesn’t require willpower-heavy steps?
Can you provide step-by-step instructions, but only the minimum steps needed, for installing a printer on Windows 11?
I need to book a dentist appointment. What’s the most convenient script to use when calling so it’s quick and clear?
I’m moving apartments. Should I hire movers, rent a truck, or use portable containers if convenience is my priority?
I have two job offers. Can you pick the more convenient one if I care most about commute and flexibility?
What’s the easiest way to set up automatic bill payments without risking overdrafts?
I want to start exercising. What’s the most convenient routine I can do at home with no equipment in under 15 minutes?
I need to translate a short email to Spanish. What’s the most convenient approach that avoids embarrassing mistakes?
I have a meeting in 5 minutes. Can you rewrite this message to my boss to be clearer and shorter?
I’m overwhelmed by my inbox. What’s the most convenient method to get to ‘inbox zero’ today?
I want to cook rice. Is a rice cooker, Instant Pot, or stovetop more convenient for consistent results?
I need to remember passwords. What’s the most convenient and safe option: browser save, a password manager, or writing them down?
I’m buying a laptop. Can you recommend the most convenient specs for everyday use without overpaying?
I’m planning a weekend trip. What’s the easiest itinerary style so I don’t waste time deciding things?
I have a headache and no medicine at home. What’s the most convenient next step to feel better safely?
My car won’t start. What’s the quickest, most convenient troubleshooting sequence I should try first?
I need to learn a presentation by tomorrow. What’s the simplest study plan that maximizes recall with minimal time?
I’m trying to decide between texting or calling customer support. Which is usually more convenient and why?
Can you give me the most convenient way to organize my files on my computer so I can find things fast?
I want to send thank-you notes after an interview. What’s the easiest, most convenient format and timing?
I’m choosing between two phones. One has better battery, the other is lighter. Which is more convenient for daily life?
I need to clean my apartment fast. What’s the most convenient order of tasks to finish in 30 minutes?
I’m taking an online course. What’s the simplest way to stay on track if I’m forgetful?
I need to return an Amazon item. What’s the most convenient return method with the least printing and packaging?
Can you help me decide whether to meal prep on Sunday or cook daily if convenience is the main goal?
